mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POSTS (postId, authorId, title, content, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES (#{postId}, #{authorId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT postId, authorId, title, content, createdAt, updatedAt FROM POSTS WHERE postId = #{postId}

SELECT postId, authorId, title, content, createdAt, updatedAt FROM POSTS WHERE 1=1
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
